problems.title: Battery lights flashing / Not Charging
problems.description: One red light or flashing blue lights. Vacuum won't turn on.
solution_steps: If 3 blue lights flash, it's a temporary fault (let it cool down).
If 1 red light flashes, the battery has a cell fault.
Dyson V10 batteries typically last 2-4 years before needing replacement.

problems.title: Airway Blocked Light / Pulsing
problems.description: The blockage indicator (pipe icon) lights up and motor pulses.
possible_causes: Filter unit is not fully twisted in
Clog in the main body inlet
solution_steps: Remove the filter, wash it, and ensure it is bone dry.
Shine a torch into the bin inlet to check for debris.
Twist the filter firmly until you feel a click.
